EU Payment Services Directive(s) and any related EU regulation

Electronic Money Directive(s) 
European Payments Council (EPC) 
Euro Retail Payments Board (ERPB)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

- Joint Money Laundering Steering Group (JMLSG)

goals__remit: The Electronic Money Association (EMA) is the European trade body for electronic money issuers and payment institutions. Members include payments companies, the telecommunications and transport sectors and specialist e-money issuers. The EMA is the industry’s voice in dealing with regulators, government bodies and international organisations. It is a forum for education, responding to regulatory proposals and establishing industry guidelines.
